+10 [industryColored] per Anomaly on System
Ancient Knowledge Your civilization has already explored the galaxy, now all that is left is to take it. Reveals all Solar Systems in the Galaxy
Well Founded Your civilization has already expended the resources to explore their constellation, but now they can finally explore it. Reveals all Nodes in Starting Constellation
Lost Refuge With an extragalactic knowledge of where all the true landmarks of the galaxy are, finding a place to hide or escape to has never been easier. Reveals all Special Nodes in the Galaxy
Predator Nature instincts make it easy to determine roughly where your prey lay. Reveals all the location of all Home Systems in the Galaxy
May not build Colony Ships May not occupy Conquered Territory
State Administration As a result of its history of decentralized government, this faction is incapable of enforcing much in the way of empire-wide legislation.
Core Administration This faction strives for centralized government and can more easily maintain empire-wide legislation.
Cheats Displays traits that have game-breaking effects #FF0000#+10 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+50 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+100 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+500 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+1000 Points#REVERT# Someone is a big cheater!

Cannot obtain Technology from other empires. Greener Pastures Your empire knows how to make it's cities look beautiful, and, alongside a good handling of tourism, many tourists end up settling in a more permanent fashion.
Ship Design Rewards Enabling this will allow you to unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. True You will unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. False You won't unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests.
--> Poacher Your empire has a.. gift for knowing where feeble empires are located, but who knows you'll do with this information. Reveals all Minor Factions in the Galaxy
